## ï¿½ï¿½ Usage

These skills are automatically available to GitHub Copilot when working in this repository. They provide:

- **MUST/MUST NOT** security requirements
- **Practical examples** with code snippets
- **ISMS policy references** from [Hack23/ISMS-PUBLIC](https://github.com/Hack23/ISMS-PUBLIC)
- **Compliance mappings** to ISO 27001:2022, NIST CSF 2.0, CIS Controls v8.1
